statements: UPDATE match_results SET home_score = 2, away_score = 1 WHERE match_id = 1;

UPDATE match_results SET team1_score = 3, team2_score = 2, team1_goals = 2, team2_goals = 1, team1_assists = 2, team2_assists = 1, team1_cards = 1, team2_cards = 2 WHERE match_id = 101 AND team1_id = 1 AND team2_id = 2;

UPDATE goals SET goal_minute = 60 WHERE goal_id = 98765;
